content.raw:
I did look at the native Gazebo wind plugin.  My memory is a little fuzzy, but the issue is how the wind affects the vessel.  As I recall, the native wind plugin would provide the translational forces, but the induced yaw torque - which is really important for surface vessels  - wasn’t possible in the plugin at the time.

It would be great if we could extend the native plugin.
content.html:
I did look at the native Gazebo wind plugin. My memory is a little fuzzy, but the issue is how the wind affects the vessel. As I recall, the native wind plugin would provide the translational forces, but the induced yaw torque - which is really important for surface vessels - wasn’t possible in the plugin at the time.

It would be great if we could extend the native plugin.
